parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM keyword_projects WHERE id = {{ $json.projectId }}) as project_id,
  (SELECT project_name FROM keyword_projects WHERE id = {{ $json.projectId }}) as project_name

=SELECT 
  cd.id,
  cd.competitor_url as url,
  cd.competitor_domain as domain,
  cd.project_id
FROM competitor_data cd
WHERE cd.project_id = {{ $json.projectId }}
  AND (cd.word_count IS NULL OR cd.word_count = 0)
LIMIT 10

=UPDATE competitor_data SET 
  word_count = {{ $json.wordCount || 0 }},
  h1_count = {{ $json.h1Count || 0 }},
  h2_count = {{ $json.h2Count || 0 }},
  h3_count = {{ $json.h3Count || 0 }},
  h4_count = {{ $json.h4Count || 0 }},
  h5_count = {{ $json.h5Count || 0 }},
  h6_count = {{ $json.h6Count || 0 }},
  analyzed_at = NOW()
WHERE id = {{ $json.competitorId }}
